data.name: !Ω Factorial Omega: My Dystopian Robot Girlfriend
data.detailed_description:
About the game

It's a unique simulator game with many game mechanics you probably haven't seen before.

Features include:
  • Fully animated headpat scene.
  • Two fully animated and interactive sex scenes.
  • About 25 days of engaging story (You can continue playing for longer, but frequency of events will go down),
  • Many events which trigger under special conditions
  • Being able to customise the bot to your liking with:
    • 15+ modules
    • 10+ clothes
    • Modding support for modules and clothes allowing you to make your own!
  • Survival aspects which alter how your character perceives the world
  • A fully functioning stock market simulation
  • Dynamic in-game stream simulator
  • Easter eggs and minigames

Setting

In the dystopian future year of 2023 the sexbot market boomed. Their numbers quickly surpassed the entire motor vehicle industry, and a golden age of peace seemed closer than ever before. Alas, a month later, an international scandal between the United States and China resulted in a world wide ban on sexbots. Life would never be the same.
Countrywide riots ensued, countless militias and terrorist groups formed, most notably the Benign Bionist Coalition and the Incontinent Cell, both fighting for control over what remains of the sexbots. Once a widely available item, the few remaining sexbots can now only be seen in the deepest corners of the dark web black market. These days it’s technically impossible to get one in good shape as all the sexbot factories were burned to the ground following the ban.
You are a young Anon living in a ghetto. Once again you are left penniless after losing a job. One night you see a military truck swerve and nearly crash in front of your apartment. Some of its cargo falls out and into a nearby ditch, and the truck drives off. You decide to investigate. As you get closer, the mystery cargo takes shape.
It's a sexbot.
Will Anon sell the sexbot and life a long and happy life? Will he be able to pay his rent or will he die, freezing to death in the lonely streets of a megacity? Your actions will decide it all.

data.short_description: Extremely unique lewd simulator game. Try to survive in a dystopian world with a very advanced and customisable sexbot you found in a ditch. Earn money with streaming, gambling, stocks or hard work and try to maintain your sanity. P.S. Sexbots are now illegal!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 SP1+, 8, 10
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04 and CentOS 7
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual scenes, nudity, strong language, and mature humor. All characters are over the age of 18.
